TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {39277=March 18, 2013, 61341=Top 10 upsets: A November to remember, 52204=Last meeting: Kentucky 92, Robert Morris 67, Dec. 30, 1993, Lexington, Ky. Jeff Sheppard scored 18 points and Jared Prickett 17, and Wildcats coach Rick Pitino drew praise from Colonials coach Jarrett Dunham for calling off the dogs in what nonetheless was a lopsided win. UK led 52-29 at halftime against a Robert Morris team that was playing its eighth straight road game to start the season. The Colonials turned over the ball on nine of their first 12 possessions. Rodrick Rhodes had 13 points for UK.}
textBeforeTable: ROBERT MORRIS (23-10, 14-4 NEC) Coach: Andrew Toole (67-35 in third season at RMU and overall) Last game: Lost to Mount St. Mary's 69-60 Roster | Stats KENTUCKY (21-11, 12-6 SEC) Coach: John Calipari (123-25 in fourth season at Kentucky; 526-163 in 21st season overall) Last game: Lost to Vanderbilt 64-48 Roster | Stats KENTUCKY AT ROBERT MORRIS | NIT FIRST ROUND | TUESDAY | 7:30 P.M. | ESPN "We're still young," Mays said. "I mean, I'm not as young as them, but they're still young kids. They should have all the energy in the world. It's obviously not what we want to do, but we still get the chance to play basketball and get a chance to play in front of our fans. So that's the most important thing."
